abstract: Two iPad cases help to illustrate a tenet of design that hardware and software makers seem to be forgetting.
snippet: Two iPad cases help to illustrate a tenet of design that hardware and software makers seem to be forgetting.
lead_paragraph: What could be simpler than an iPad case? A company just sent me two that raise that question and illustrate a tenet of design that hardware and software makers seem to be forgetting.

headline.main: Two iPad Cases and a Screed
